mapper.select: SELECT teacher.id, teacher. NAME, school. NAME AS schoolname, school_level.`name` AS schoollevelname, `subject`. NAME AS subjectname, title. NAME AS titlename, teacher.isGood FROM teacher, title, `subject`, school, school_level WHERE school = school.id AND diploma = school_level.id AND `subject` = `subject`.id AND teacher.title = title.id ORDER BY id limit ${start}, ${end}

SELECT teacher.id, teacher. NAME, school. NAME AS schoolname, school_level.`name` AS schoollevelname, `subject`. NAME AS subjectname, title. NAME AS titlename, teacher.isGood FROM teacher, title, `subject`, school, school_level WHERE school = school.id AND diploma = school_level.id AND `subject` = `subject`.id AND teacher.title = title.id and teacher.name = '${name}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher (name, school, diploma, subject, title, isGood) VALUE ('${name}', ${school}, ${diploma}, ${subject}, ${title}, ${isGood})
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET name = '${name}', school = ${school}, diploma = ${diploma}, subject = ${subject}, title = ${title}, isGood = ${isGood} WHERE id = ${id}
